duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in business development and marketing efforts for transportation infrastructure projects.
Plan, schedule, coordinate, and manage detailed phases of highway engineering projects.
Verify compliance with codes, standards, and environmental commitments.
Review and approve scopes, budgets, and schedules for assignments.
Track overall financial performance and work backlog on tasks.
Mentor, train, and supervise less experienced staff.
Contact and interact with local public sector clients to successfully complete projects.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science in Civil Engineering or related field. Professional Engineer in the State of Pennsylvania.
Previous experience in achieving scope, schedule, and budget goals on large-scale transportation projects. WVDOH experience.
